title: A Cooler Full of Curry with Amy Doan
description:
The ageless Amy “Shrinkle” Doan, founder of Sugarpill cosmetics, reminisces about starting an indie makeup line, blending business and passion, and unfortunate burrito incidents. 
With their cruelty-free line celebrating its 10 year anniversary, Amy reveals the struggles of being taken seriously in the business world and paying her dues.

Support Sugarpill cosmetics https://sugarpill.com/
To follow Amy Doan: @shrinkle
To follow Trixie: @TrixieMattel
To follow Katya: @Katya_Zamo
To listen to our podcast on YouTube: http://bit.ly/TBATBYT 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
